text: Penny's Big Breakaway is a 2024 platformer developed by Evening Star and published by Private Division. It was released on February 21, 2024 for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Windows, and Xbox Series X/S. The game was announced in a Nintendo Direct presentation which aired on June 21, 2023. The game follow Penny and Emperor Eddie and his clones of penguins causing a stir. == Gameplay== The player controls Penny, becoming a Street performer who is pairing up with a yo-yo that has ben given by a cosmic string. == Plot== The game is set on a planet called Macaroon in Vaillatown, Penny noticed a flyer audition for performers to partner up with Emperor Eddie. == Development== 'Penny's Big Breakaway was developed by Evening Star, a company founded in 2018 the creators of Sonic Mania and led by Christian Whitehead. == References == Category:2024 video games Category:3D platformers Category:Action video games Category:Indie video games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
